title: A day away at EPCOT

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pick any alive player. If they're the last remaining REF, a neutral, or a townie, get this ability refunded. If they're an REF and they have teammates left, kill them and leave only one member of their faction alive. You can only do this once.
- If Jd's an REF, and you target him, Jd will be left alive.
- The image below will be posted in the REF channel afterwards

desc:
Post 4250
*i disappear for a day to go to epcot and this is what happens*
*welp*
*-Jd, <t:1693616400:f>*
